title: Vite Prod Builder
description: Builds a Vite.js application for production.

outputPath.description: The output path of the generated files.

buildLibsFromSource.description: Read buildable libraries from source instead of building them separately.

skipTypeCheck.description: Skip type-checking via TypeScript. Skipping type-checking speeds up the build but type errors are not caught.

tsConfig.description: The path to custom tsconfig file for type-checking when skipTypeCheck is false. Required when tsconfig file is not at the projectRoot level.

configFile.description: The name of the Vite.js configuration file.

generatePackageJson.description: Generate a package.json for the build output.

includeDevDependenciesInPackageJson.description: Include devDependencies in the generated package.json.

skipOverrides.description: Do not add a `overrides` and `resolutions` entries to the generated package.json file. Only works in conjunction with `generatePackageJson` option.

skipPackageManager.description: Do not add a `packageManager` entry to the generated package.json file. Only works in conjunction with `generatePackageJson` option.

useEnvironmentsApi.description: Use the new Environments API for building multiple environments at once. Only works with Vite 6.0.0 or higher.
